Description: The Northern Ireland Housing Statistics report is an annual compendium of statistics containing information on a range of areas relating to housing. The report is divided into sections covering: Household Characteristics.
Name: Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18: Household Characteristics
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified as an Excel file entitled Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18 Section 6 Tables Household Characteristics under heading Documents.
Sizing Notes: A bit messy with footnote markers, different measures and mixed dimensions.  Will need a fair bit of up-front analysis
